Package org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config

Interface Summary
SearchableCompassConfigurator Configures Compass
 

Class Summary
CompassXmlConfigurationSearchableCompassConfigurator A SearchableCompassConfigurator that configures Compass with a native compass.cfg.xml at the root of the classpath, if available
CompositeSearchableCompassConfigurator A composite implememtation of SearchableCompassConfigurator that simply applies all the composed configurators in turn
DefaultGrailsDomainClassMappingSearchableCompassConfigurator A Compass configurator that configures Compass with the Grails domain class mappings.
EnvironmentSearchableCompassConfigurator Responsible for setting the Compass environment, most importantly the "connection" (ie, Lucene index dir), as well as any other general properties
InferredCompassSettingCompassConfigurator Sets Compas settings depending on mappings, eg, enables global spell check setting if any mappings use it
SearchableCompassConfiguratorFactory
